availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isabell Brookover (Huntington, Brown County, Ohio resident)

body.p: Huntington, Brown County, Ohio resident. Kentucky Native. Married to Richard Brookover. Mother of John Brookover, Mary J. Brookover, Andelea Brookover, George W. Brookover. Resident of Huntington, Brown County, Ohio in 1850. Resident of Huntington, Brown County, Ohio in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, District No. 12, Huntington Township, p. 100B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Huntington Township, p. 291.
